about_the_game:
Red Cap Squad: Zombe Source is a survival roguelike game.

As a commander, your mission takes you to an deserted military factory overrun by the undead. Recruit team members, build a unique squad lineup, and strategically use traps and mechanisms to fend off relentless waves of zombies. Survive for 20 intense minutes to claim victory!

Build and Synergize

Start from scratch and recruit up to 10 soldiers to form your squad. Choose your upgrade strategy and activate adjacent synergy effects. Craft cunning upgrade paths and unlock potent synergies to forge an unstoppable team.

Formation Control

Flex your tactical prowess as you dynamically rotate and morph your squad's formation on the fly. Maximize experience collection, expand attack coverage, and bolster your defensive perimeter against the relentless swarms.

Traps and Mechanisms

The battlefield is littered with traps that affect both friend and foe. Use them strategically to deal devastating blows to enemies, but remain vigilant to avoid falling victim to them.

Zombie Wave Onslaught

Brace yourself for the onslaught as thousands of ravenous zombies descend upon you in successive waves, each harboring distinct threats. Adapt swiftly, think on your feet, and carve a bloody path to victory.

This game is continuously being developed and optimized, and any feedback or suggestions are extremely valuable to us. Welcome to join the community (Discord or Steam) and discuss with us!
